issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: Appcelerator Studio Freezes on Windows 7. Titanium Studio works well with same config. When I try to edit view xml .issue appeared. other files works well for example controller or tss files.
fields.environment:
Windows 7
Java -version :1.8.0_40
Appcelerator Studio 4.0.0

I also   add  my environment as env.txt

comments.body: We can't reproduce this issue with the latest version of the Studio and SDK. Not sure if this is still an issue for you. Please consider updating the studio to the latest release and let us know if you run in this error again.
